claims.claim: Multiple teams were making similar data requests with slight modifications, increasing database load
claims.quote: It was observed that many users across different teams would need similar data, only with slight modifications. The multiple requests would increase the load of the database.

claims.claim: Analytics tools consumed significant time from analysts
claims.quote: Additionally, these tools would consume a lot of time from analysts.

claims.claim: Pre-defined events in product analytics tools limited exploratory analysis capabilities
claims.quote: They had to pre-define events between the application and users on the product analytics tool. This limited their ability to conduct exploratory analysis.

claims.claim: Data transformation and enrichment was required from existing tools
claims.quote: The data from these tools would sometimes need to be transformed and enriched, so a solution that could extract and transform the data was required.
